author: Marty Johnson
title: Schools struggle to take attendance amid coronavirus stay at home learning
description: Schools around the country are having a hard time tracking whether or not students are participating in virtual learning amidst the coronavirus outbreak which has caused many school districts in the U.S. to close for the...
content:
Schools around the country are having a hard time tracking whether or not students are participating in virtual learning amidst the coronavirus outbreak which has caused many school districts in the U.S. to close for the rest of the school year.
Normally, at… [+1599 chars]
